---
name: Feature pull request
about: Create a pull request to a branch for a new feature
title: '[Feature/Pull Request]'
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''

---

**What is this feature for? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of what the feature is.

**Please, explain the impact on the actual code**
A clear and concise description of what functions/features this codes changes.

**Risks**
A clear and concise description of any risks involved on these changes.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

**Check list**
- [ ] The name of the branch matches the form `feature/issue_name`
- [ ] Labels `enhancement` are set.
- [ ] Changes are tested on the local machine.
- [ ] Pair revision is done.
- [ ] Code is corrected based on pair revisions and local tests.
- [ ] Documentation is updated.
- [ ] Translation is updated.
- [ ] There are no blocking issues.
